Mr Justice Holman, sitting in London, allowed the challenges by the councils, declaring Mr Michael Gove had unlawfully failed to consult them before imposing the cuts. In five of the cases the failure was so unfair as to amount to an abuse of power, said the judge. The victorious authorities include Waltham Forest Council, Luton Borough Council, Nottingham City Council, Sandwell Council, Kent County Council and Newham Council. The judge said: "
